transformation.badge: UNLEASH AI MAGIC FOR YOUR DIGITAL IDENTITY
transformation.title: Transform ANY Image into Pure Digital Gold!
transformation.subtitle: Nano Banana is perfect for editing any type of image – no more need for Photoshop! Click to preview editing results.

portrait.title: Stunning Portrait Transformations!
portrait.description: Enhance portraits with AI precision: perfect skin tone, professional lighting, and natural beauty enhancement.

magic3d.title: Mind-Blowing 3D Magic!
magic3d.description: Transform your 2D cartoons into stunning 3D models with Nano Banana AI's advanced rendering technology.

color.title: Hollywood-Grade Color Mastery!
color.description: No need for Photoshop - Nano Banana AI understands your color grading needs perfectly.

pose.title: Dynamic Pose Revolution!
pose.description: Transform character poses in your images - adjust positioning, hand gestures, and body postures with precision.

brand.title: Brand Identity Powerhouse!
brand.description: Nano Banana AI precisely edits specific regions based on your prompts - modify logos, colors, and branding with accuracy.

style.title: Instant Style Makeovers!
style.description: Just let Nano Banana AI to change outfits - it will swap clothing while preserving everything else in your image perfectly.

showcase.title: Unleash the Revolutionary Power of AI Image Magic!
showcase.subtitle: Discover amazing nano banana AI image editing results from the community. Click any image to view the original tweet.

howTo.title: Master AI Image Creation in Just 3 Explosive Steps!
howTo.subtitle: Upload your image, add your editing prompts, and get amazing results. No complex operations needed – AI does all the heavy lifting for you.

1.title: Ignite Your Vision - Upload & Command the AI!
1.description: Click the upload button to select the image you want to edit. In the prompt box, describe what changes you want – enhance colors, adjust style, or transform the scene.

2.title: Watch AI Work Its Mind-Blowing Magic!
2.description: Click the Generate button, and our AI will instantly analyze your image and prompt to create the perfect edited result with precision and quality.

3.title: Claim Your Masterpiece & Blow Minds!
3.description: Once the edited image is ready, preview it immediately. If you're happy with the result, click the Download button to save the high-quality image ready for any use.

features.title: Supercharge Your Creativity with Game-Changing AI Arsenal!
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create, edit, and enhance images with cutting-edge AI technology

creation.title: Epic Image Creation Engine!
creation.description: Transform your ideas into stunning visuals with our advanced AI models

background.title: Instant Background Obliteration!
background.description: Remove backgrounds instantly with precision AI technology

templates.title: Explosive Template Collection!
templates.description: Choose from hundreds of professionally designed templates

whyChoose.title: Why Nano Banana is the Ultimate Creative Weapon!
whyChoose.subtitle: Join thousands of creators who trust Nano Banana for their AI image generation needs

speed.title: Blazingly Insane Speed!
speed.description: Generate high-quality images in seconds, not minutes. Our optimized AI models deliver results instantly.

limitless.title: Limitless Creative Universe!
limitless.description: From photorealistic to anime, illustrations to product shots - create any style you can imagine.

risk.title: Zero Risk, Maximum Impact!
risk.description: No upfront costs. Try our platform with free credits and only pay for what you use.

privacy.title: Fort Knox-Level Privacy!
privacy.description: Your creations are private by default. We respect your intellectual property and creativity.

finalCta.title: Ready to Unleash Your Creative Superpowers?
